error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE (bibs.c_cutter = 0 AND bibs.c_type != "fea" AND bibs.c_type != "eas") OR (bibs.c_cutter = 0 AND bibs.c_type = "eas" AND bibs.author IS NOT NULL)
error.description: Missing cutter in the call number

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.b_call IS NOT NULL AND (bibs.b_call LIKE "% 0" OR bibs.b_call LIKE "% 1" OR bibs.b_call LIKE "% 2" OR bibs.b_call LIKE "% 3" OR bibs.b_call LIKE "% 4" OR bibs.b_call LIKE "% 5" OR bibs.b_call LIKE "% 6" OR bibs.b_call LIKE "% 7" OR bibs.b_call LIKE "% 8" OR bibs.b_call LIKE "% 9")
error.description: Call number cutter is a digit

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_cutter = 1 AND bibs.c_type = "eas" AND bibs.author IS NULL
error.description: J-E title entry book with a cutter in the call number

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey NOT NULL AND bibs.c_dewey LIKE "%0" AND bibs.c_dewey LIKE "%.%"
error.description: Trailing zero in Dewey number in the call number

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "81%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "81_.0%" AND (bibs.c_dewey LIKE "811.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "812.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "813.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "814.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "815.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "816.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "817.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "818.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "810.800_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "810.900_%")
error.description: Time period in American Literature

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "82%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "82_.0%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "822.33%" AND (bibs.c_dewey LIKE "821.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "822.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "823.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "824.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "825.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "826.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "827.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "828.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "820.800_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "820.900_%")
error.description: Time period in English Literature

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "86%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "86_.0%" AND (bibs.c_dewey LIKE "861.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "862.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "863.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "864.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "865.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "866.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "867.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "868.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "860.800_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "860.900_%")
error.description: Time period in Spanish Literature

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.1%" AND (bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.11_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.12_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.13_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.14_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.15_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.16_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.17_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.18_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.10800_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "895.10900_%") AND (bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "895.110%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "895.120%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "895.130%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "895.140%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "895.160%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "895.170%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "895.180%")
error.description: Time period in Chinese Literature

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.7%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "891.70%" AND (bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.71_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.72_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.73_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.74_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.75_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.76_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.77_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.78_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.70800_%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "891.70900_%") AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "891.7_08" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "891.7_09"
error.description: Time period in Russian Literature

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "81_.09%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "81_.08%"
error.description: Incorrect Dewey for criticism/collection of American literary genre; use 81x.009x or 81x.008x instead

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "82_.09%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "82_.08%"
error.description: Incorrect Dewey for ciriticsm/collection of English literary genre; use 82x.009x or 82x.008x instead

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "86_.09%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "86_.08%"
error.description: Incorrect Dewey for ciriticsm/collection of English literary genre; use 86x.009x or 86x.008x instead

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_wl = 1 AND bibs.c_dewey IS NOT NULL AND (bibs.subjects LIKE "%language Textbooks for foreign speakers English.%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%language Conversation and phrase books English%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%language Sound recordings for foreign speakers English.%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%Study and teaching English speakers.%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%language Dictionaries, Juvenile English.%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%language Dictionaries English.%")
error.description: Incorrect language prefix for foreign language textbooks, dictionaries, etc. intended for English speakers; should be classed in English collection

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type != "des" AND (bibs.c_dewey = "005.133" OR bibs.c_dewey = "005.262" OR bibs.c_dewey = "005.252") AND bibs.subjects LIKE "%(Computer program language)%"
error.description: Missing computer language name in the call number, example: 005.133 PYTHON D

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type != "des" and bibs.c_dewey = "004.1675" AND (bibs.subjects LIKE "%(Electronic book reader)%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%(Computer)%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%(Smartphone)%")
error.description: Missing device name in the call number, example: 004.1675 IPHONE D

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type != "des" AND (bibs.c_dewey = "005.268" OR bibs.c_dewey = "005.258") AND bibs.subjects LIKE "%(Electronic resource)%"
error.description: Missing name of operating system in the call number; example: 005.258 IOS F

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type != "des" AND bibs.c_dewey LIKE "19%" AND (bibs.subject_person IS NOT NULL OR bibs.crit_work = 1)
error.description: Missing philosopher name in the call number; example 193 KANT D

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type != "fic" AND bibs.c_type != "eas" AND (bibs.c_format = "pr" OR bibs.c_format = "au" OR bibs.c_format = 'ki') AND (bibs.subjects LIKE "% Fiction.%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "% Juvenile fiction%") AND NOT (bibs.subjects LIKE "%criticism%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "%8" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%Stories in rhyme.%" OR bibs.c_dewey LIKE "398.2%")
error.description: Likely FIC call number not coded as such

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type != "des" AND bibs.c_dewey LIKE "8%" AND bibs.crit_work = 1 AND bibs.subject_person IS NOT NULL
error.description: Criticism of works of author missing authors name in call number, example: 813 ASIMOV A

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type = "fic" AND bibs.author IS NOT NULL AND bibs.subject_person IS NOT NULL AND (bibs.title like "%annotated%" OR bibs.crit_work = 1)
error.description: Likely annotated fiction edition - consider Dewey instead

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.author = "SHAKESPEARE" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "822.33 S52 __ _%" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "822.33 S52 L _" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "822.33 S52 M _" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "822.33 S52 N _" AND bibs.subjects NOT LIKE "%Quotations.%"
error.description: Incorrect call number for Shakespeare individual work

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.author = "SHAKESPEARE" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "822.33 S52 H" AND bibs.subjects LIKE "%Quotations.%"
error.description: Shakespeare quotiation/maxims with incorrect call number, example 822.33 S52 H

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.crit_work = 1 AND bibs.subjects LIKE "%Shakespeare, William%" AND (bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "822.33 S52 __ _%" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "822.33 S52 D _" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "822.33 S52 E _" AND bibs.subjects NOT LIKE "%Adaptations.%")
error.description: Shakespeare criticism with incorrect call number

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_format != "mu" AND (bibs.subjects LIKE "% Scores.%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%Scores. lcgft%")
error.description: Score not classed with Mu prefix

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "91%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "910%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "911%" AND bibs.c_dewey NOT LIKE "912%" AND bibs.subjects NOT LIKE "%Guidebooks.%" AND bibs.subjects NOT LIKE "%Tours.%"
error.description: Likely not guidebook classed in 911-919 range reserved for guidebooks; class in history instead

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_dewey LIKE "220.5%" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "%B582 _%"
error.description: Bible missing B582 element in the call number, example: 220.5203 B582 HG

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.author = "DAVIS" AND bibs.subjects LIKE "%Garfield%" AND bibs.subjects LIKE "%Comic books, strips, etc.%" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "741.5973 D"
error.description: Garfield comic strips not in 741.5973; prefer 741.5973 over 741.56973; never classify in fiction

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_audn = "e" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%je%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%er%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%wl%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%li%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%as%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%bt%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%cp%"
error.description: J-E call number does not corresponds to correct order shelf location(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_audn = "j" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND ((orders.o_audn = "j" AND (orders.o_shelf LIKE "%je%" OR orders.o_shelf LIKE "%er%")) OR (orders.o_audn != "j" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%li%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%cp%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%cd%"))
error.description: General juvenile call number does not corresponds to order shelf location(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_audn = "a" AND orders.o_audn != "a" AND orders.o_audn != "y" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%cp%"
error.description: Adult/Young Adult call number with incorrect order shelf location(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type = "bio" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%bi%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%wl%" AND orders.o_shelf != "nb" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%br%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%li%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%au%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%dv%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%ej%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%lp%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%rf%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%br%" AND (orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%dk%" AND orders.o_branch != "19")
error.description: Biography call number with incorrect order shelf location(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE (bibs.c_type = "dew" OR bibs.c_type = "des") AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%nf%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%wl%" AND orders.o_shelf != "nb" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%li%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%ej%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%br%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%rf%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%as%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%au%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%cp%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%bt%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%dv%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%lp%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%tp%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%bb%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%fd%" AND (orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%dk%" AND orders.o_branch != "19")
error.description: Non-fiction call number with incorrect order shelf location(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type = "fic" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%fc%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%wl%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%li%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%je%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%br%" AND orders.o_shelf != "nb" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%rf%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%as%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%au%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%cp%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%bt%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%lp%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%tp%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%my%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%sf%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%sh%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%fd%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%pb%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%cd%" AND (orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%dk%" AND orders.o_branch != "19")
error.description: Fiction call number with incorrect order shelf location(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_wl = 1 AND orders.o_shelf LIKE "%bb%"
error.description: Bilingual shelf code with world language prefix in the call number; should be classed for English collection

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE orders.o_branch LIKE "%16%" AND bibs.b_call IS NOT NULL AND (bibs.c_division != "ss" OR bibs.c_dewey IS NULL)
error.description: SST (16) order location with incorrect Dewey range

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, b_call, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE orders.o_branch LIKE "%13%" AND bibs.c_division != "hb" AND bibs.c_type != "bio" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%bc%"
error.description: HBR (13) order location with incorrect Dewey range; optionally change to 13abc - includes all Dewey ranges

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE orders.o_branch LIKE "%11%" AND (bibs.c_division != "ar" OR bibs.c_dewey IS NULL)
error.description: AMS (11) order location with incorrect Dewey range

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE orders.o_branch LIKE "%14%" AND bibs.c_dewey IS NOT NULL AND bibs.c_division != "ll" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%wl%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%dv%"
error.description: LL (14) order location with incorrect Dewey range

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE orders.o_shelf LIKE "%bt%" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "%KIT %" AND bibs.b_call NOT LIKE "%BOOK %"
error.description: Book and CD order code without proper format prefix

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note LIKE "%cc%" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_branch NOT LIKE "%16%"
error.description: SST Core Collection PO per line without 16 as a location

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note LIKE "%easy%" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%er%"
error.description: Easy Reader PO per line with incorrect shelf code(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note LIKE "%ref%" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%rf%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%rd%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%br%"
error.description: REF PO per line with incorrect shelf code(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note LIKE "%bio%" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%bi%" AND orders.o_shelf != "nb"
error.description: BIO PO per line with incorrect shelf code(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note = "a" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%as%"
error.description: A (assigment) PO per line with incorrect shelf code(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note = "r" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%fc%" AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%pb%" AND orders.o_shelf != "nb"
error.description: R (romance) PO per line with incorrect shelf code(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note = "m" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%my%" AND orders.o_shelf != "nb" AND orders.o_audn NOT LIKE "%j%"
error.description: M (myster) PO per line with incorrect shelf code(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note = "s" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%sf%" AND orders.o_shelf != "nb" AND orders.o_audn NOT LIKE "%j%"
error.description: S (science fiction) PO per line with incorrect shelf code(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note = "y" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%sh%" AND orders.o_shelf != "nb" AND orders.o_audn NOT LIKE "%j%"
error.description: Y (short stories) PO per line with incorrect shelf code(s)

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note = "g" AND NOT (bibs.subjects LIKE "%Comic books, strips, etc%" OR bibs.subjects LIKE "%Graphic novels%")
error.description: Likely incorrect graphic novel label

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE ven_note = "pic" AND orders.o_shelf IS NOT NULL AND orders.o_shelf NOT LIKE "%je%"
error.description: PIC (JE regular) PO per line with incorrect shelf code(s); all location should be coded as "jje"

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_type IS NULL
error.description: Missing or not used by library type of call number

error.query: SELECT bibs.id AS bid, title, orders.id AS oid, copies FROM bibs JOIN orders ON orders.bid = bibs.id WHERE bibs.c_wl = 1 AND bibs.b_call LIKE "%UND %"
error.description: UND as a language prefix
